original: There exist supernatural beings.

original: I don't mind at all.

original: He defends and protects his family.

original: I'll do anything.

original: The park is open to everybody.

original: She slept in the car.

original: I was unable to look her in the face.

original: Your friends are late.

original: This is his.

original: She doesn't pay attention to others; in other words, she is selfish.

original: I need to see you tonight.

original: I have sand in my hair.

original: How fast you run!

original: I usually use a credit card instead of cash.

original: Keep your hands where I can see them.

original: He was dazzled by her beauty.

original: There was no question about that.

original: I bet you're talking about Tom.

original: I refused to believe him.

original: There is a rapid increase in world population.

original: He is from France.

translated: Ensemble, nous avons établis un Partenariat Ouvert du Gouvernement afin que de plus en plus de transparence renforce toujours plus de personne à travers le monde.

original: That joke isn't funny.

original: This was easy.

original: The game of chess could have a great future in our society. I dream of its teaching in schools, its popularization with the help of the internet and the prevention of Alzheimer's disease.

original: I think it's strange that Alice should keep silent for such a long time.

original: The basket was full of apples.

original: You understand this, don't you?

original: Tom seems to be nervous.

original: I love what you've done with the place.

original: That's generous of you.

original: What's your favorite language?

original: Don't talk to me.

original: You have to stay hydrated.

original: What is your house like?

original: Tom is there already.

original: I feel stuffy.

original: Tom is drenched.

original: Close the door.

original: You can sleep here for a while if you want to.

original: I don't know the mayor but I'd like to meet him.

original: It is forbidden to park here.

original: I'm not feeling well at all.

original: Let's go and swim in the river.

original: The shopkeeper was tired of chasing his debtors so from then on he demanded payment in full.

original: I've read that book several times.

original: I don't know anybody by that name.

original: We're late.

original: What would you do in this type of situation?

translated: Des militants ont œuvré pour la démolition de nombre de barrages, afin que les écoulements d'eau naturels puissent revenir dans les rivières concernées.

original: A great number of students battled for freedom of speech.

original: My wife will be glad to see you, too.

original: The man was arrested as a spy.

original: No matter who comes, don't open the door.

original: He has expensive tastes.

translated: Les amis de Sadako voulaient lui construire un monument ainsi qu'à tous les enfants qui ont été tués par la bombe atomique.

original: You should begin.

original: Are you going to be OK?

original: A sound sleep made me feel better.

original: Sweet dreams!

original: But how can they do this?

translated: Parfois je souhaiterais vivre une sorte de vie calme et retraitée mais je doute que je puisse la supporter plus de quelques jours.

original: That's not exactly a top priority.

original: We rented an apartment when we lived in New York.

original: You seemed exhausted.

original: I was born and brought up in Tokyo.

original: The bus will be here in five minutes.

original: These ties are for sale.

original: He was my only joy.

original: She committed suicide by jumping off the bridge.

original: I don't know what to tell you.

original: I can't stay here tonight.

translated: Je ne sais pas ce que j'ai fait de travers.

original: Show it to me.
translated: Montrez-le-moi.

original: I saw the video.
translated: J'ai vu la vidéo.

original: I want to go home now.
translated: Je veux aller chez moi maintenant.

original: She didn't like the horse at first.
translated: Elle n'aimait pas le cheval au début.

original: The word's origin is unknown.
translated: L'origine du mot est inconnue.

original: You had dealings with a crook.
translated: Tu avais affaire à un escroc.

original: There are many people who think that it’s impossible not to mix up languages.
translated: Il y a beaucoup de gens qui pensent qu’il est impossible de ne pas mélanger les langues.

original: You've done enough.
translated: Tu en as fait assez.

original: I myself do not understand how it happened.
translated: Je ne comprends pas moi-même comment c'est arrivé.

original: Tom always forgets Mary's birthday.
translated: Tom oublie toujours l’anniversaire de Marie.

original: The electricity failed during the storm.
translated: Le courant s'est coupé durant la tempête.

original: The skipper is giving the order to board the ship.
translated: Le capitaine donne l'ordre d'embarquer sur le navire.

original: Can you take a little break?
translated: Peux-tu prendre une petite pause ?

original: She told me she doesn't eat meat.
translated: Elle m’a dit qu’elle ne mangeait pas de viande.

original: The earth is small compared with the sun.
translated: En comparaison avec le Soleil, la Terre est petite.

original: She has no one to talk to.
translated: Elle n'a personne à qui parler.

original: Can't you understand that it's impossible?
translated: Ne pouvez-vous pas comprendre que c'est impossible ?

original: He overslept.
translated: Il a trop dormi.

original: What do you like? What don't you like?
translated: Qu'est-ce que tu aimes? Qu'est-ce que tu n'aimes pas?

original: To tell the truth, they are not husband and wife.
translated: À dire vrai, ils ne sont pas mari et femme.

original: What's the fun in this?
translated: Qu'est-ce qu'il y a de drôle à ça?

original: This is getting awkward.
translated: Cela devient pénible.

original: You'll fatten up if you eat that much.
translated: Tu vas grossir si tu manges tant.

original: It bears fruit, but it seems it may even set root from cuttings?
translated: Il fructifie aussi, et on dirait qu'il peut même s'enraciner par bouturage ?

original: He can't take it anymore.
translated: Il n'en peut plus.

original: She painted the walls white.
translated: Elle a peint les murs en blanc.

original: I knew we should've stayed in Boston.
translated: Je savais qu'on aurait dû rester à Boston.

original: Stop me if you've heard this one.
translated: Arrête-moi si tu as déjà entendu celle-là.

original: We thought you didn't like it.
translated: Nous avons pensé que ça ne t'a pas plu.

original: I decided to tell her that I love her.
translated: J'ai décidé de lui dire que je l'aime.

original: I did not order this.
translated: Je n'ai pas commandé ça.

original: Tom certainly got the message.
translated: Tom a certainement reçu le message.

original: Of the eight, only one was found guilty.
translated: Des huit, seul un fut déclaré coupable.

original: She was impossible to ignore.
translated: Il était impossible de l'ignorer.

original: Let me deal with this.
translated: Laissez-moi m'en charger !

original: Tom chose wisely.
translated: Tom a fait un choix judicieux.

original: Clean the room.
translated: Nettoie la pièce.

original: I often do this.
translated: Je fais souvent ça.

original: There's blood in my urine.
translated: Il y a du sang dans mon urine.

original: Let's leave the matter as it is for the present.
translated: Laissons le problème où il est pour le moment.

original: Yanni testified.
translated: Yanni témoigna.

original: Tom writes to his uncle.
translated: Tom écrit à son oncle.

original: Let's continue the game after lunch.
translated: Continuons le jeu après manger.

original: She barely was able to get out of bed.
translated: Elle pouvait à peine sortir du lit.

original: Tom sounded surprised.
translated: Tom avait l'air surpris.

original: Algeria does not respect human rights.
translated: L'Algérie ne respecte pas les droits de l'homme.

original: I've lost your lighter again.
translated: J'ai encore perdu ton briquet.

original: That boy is Tony, isn't he?
translated: Ce garçon est Tony, non ?

original: What time do you go to work?
translated: À quelle heure allez-vous au travail ?

original: Do you think I'm wasting my time?
translated: Penses-tu que je perde mon temps ?

original: I want to live in the countryside.
translated: Je veux vivre à la campagne.

original: I can't deny it. You've got style.
translated: Je ne peux pas le nier. T'as du style.

original: Buy the dress you want.
translated: Achète la robe que tu veux.

original: Go ahead, try it now.
translated: Vas-y, essaye maintenant !

original: No one can hear us.
translated: Personne ne parvient à nous entendre.

original: I am not quite sure if we can meet your requirements.
translated: Je ne suis pas sûr que nous satisfassions à vos exigences.

original: I don't translate, therefore I am not.
translated: Je ne traduis pas, donc je ne suis pas.

original: I don't think that there is any better way to learn English than by living in America.
translated: Je ne pense pas qu'il y ait de meilleure méthode pour apprendre l'anglais que de vivre aux États-Unis.

original: I can't eat chicken.
translated: Je ne peux pas manger de poulet.

original: The next question is for you.
translated: La prochaine question est pour toi.

original: His smile put me at ease.
translated: Son sourire me détendit.

original: Will you help me?
translated: Peux-tu me donner un coup de main ?

original: Unsupported first-impression negative opinions are of small value.
translated: Les opinions négatives de première impression, non étayées, sont de peu de valeur.

original: Is the octopus one of your favourites?
translated: Est-ce que la pieuvre fait partie de tes préférés ?

original: Why are you so busy today?
translated: Pourquoi êtes-vous si occupées aujourd'hui ?

original: Tom will probably say no.
translated: Tom dira probablement non.

original: Tom is going to make it on time.
translated: Tom va le faire à temps.

original: I've never eaten Chinese food before.
translated: Je n'avais jamais mangé de nourriture chinoise auparavant.

original: Keep an eye on them.
translated: Gardez un œil sur eux.

original: I know that you're very angry.
translated: Je sais que vous êtes très en colère.

original: Is this seat empty?
translated: Cette chaise est-elle libre ?

original: Is that seat available?
translated: Ce siège est-il libre ?

original: I give you my word.
translated: Je te donne ma parole.

original: You're really contradicting yourself.
translated: Vous vous contredisez vraiment.

original: They despise him.
translated: Elles le méprisent.

original: That would be a good start.
translated: Ça serait un bon début.

original: Don't drink the water.
translated: Ne bois pas l'eau.

original: I don't have anything to give to you.
translated: Je n'ai rien à te donner.

original: She's looking at us.
translated: Elle est en train de nous regarder.
